scripts.comment01: npm watch is at localhost/baby...., NOT at :8080
scripts.comment02: prebuild creates an importable version number
scripts.build: npm run prebuild && rm -rf dist.1.11/ && tsc --noEmit && webpack --config webpack.player.dev.js && npm run copylib2d && npm run copy2moodle && npm run copy2playground
scripts.buildproduction: npm run prebuild && rm -rf dist.1.11/ && tsc --noEmit && webpack --config webpack.player.prod.js && npm run copylib2d && npm run copy2moodle && npm run copy2playground
scripts.copylib2d: cp -R lib/*.* dist.1.11 && cp -R lib/fonts dist.1.11 && cp -R lib/bootstrap dist.1.11
scripts.buildeditor: rm -rf dist.1.11_editor && webpack --config webpack.editor.config.js && npm run copyeditor
scripts.copyeditor: cp src_editor/runtime/index.php dist.1.11_editor/index.php  && cp src_editor/runtime/3d.css dist.1.11_editor && cp -R assets dist.1.11_editor/assets
